summary: Test suite for the Stable Diffusion XL inpainting pipeline that incorporates pixel‑aware guidance (Prompt Attention Guidance). It includes fast unit tests that validate dummy component setup, enable/disable behavior, inference execution, and optional component serialization, as well as integration tests that prepare real data, manage GPU resources, and verify both guided and unconditioned generation scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and reproducibility of the SDXL inpainting pipeline with pixel‑aware guidance, supporting continuous development and safe deployment of AI‑driven image editing capabilities.
